name: Kunstvallei BV
goal: The goal of Kunstvallei is to merge all data concerning cultural production in the sense of authorship as well as all data concerning the marketing of the products of artistic authorship into one database that will be managed by authors (artists) as well as producers, venues, and the public in their common interest.
interests: Communication, Culture, Culture and media, Education and training, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
The International Federation of Actors (FIA);
A Single Market for Intellectual Property Rights;
The European IPR Helpdesk;
Register for the International Standard Name Identifier (ISNI);
Authentication in Art (AiA)
